context: I was on a cruise back in 1990 and during the cruise I went to CocoCay Island in the Bahamas for snorkeling. The cruise director said that about a month ago a gentleman lost his wedding band while snorkeling in the area. Lo and behold, I found it about 100 yards out. I was so excited I about blasted my ear drums diving down about 10 feet to get to it. It was neatly nestled in a center of some coral. Like a dummy I gave it to the cruise director. I should have asked for the person's info myself to assure it got back to the rightful owner. It was a nice band with diamond inlays.
